reviewText: Really fun and engaging course. I always wanted to play some kind of musical instrument and the beginners lessons was the perfect fit for me.
name: Greddie Man Halen

reviewText: I am a big fan of a very niche band and there are almost no tutorials online on some of there less known songs. The tab arrangement service really helped me out here
name: Splash

reviewText: Both guitarists of my highschool band took the advanced lessons and they are one of the key factors behind our success.
name: Angryous Young
